meanings.sent1: The pitchy substance stuck to my shoes.
meanings.sent2: The road was dark and pitchy under the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The pitchy smell of the forest reminded me of a campfire.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a pitchy quality, like a creaky old door.
meanings.sent5: The pitchy texture of the tar made it difficult to remove from my hands.

meanings.definition: Having a dark or thick quality, like pitch.
meanings.sent1: The room had a pitchy atmosphere that made it feel eerie.
meanings.sent2: The stew had a pitchy consistency that made it hearty and satisfying.
meanings.sent3: The pitchy shadows in the cave made it seem like a mysterious hideout.
meanings.sent4: His pitchy hair was so thick, it almost looked like a helmet.
meanings.sent5: The pitchy clouds overhead threatened an impending storm.

meanings.sent1: The pitchy tree emitted a strong scent in the warm sun.
meanings.sent2: The pitchy boat had a glossy sheen from the resin coating.
meanings.sent3: The pitchy sap dripped slowly from the tree, like tears of amber.
meanings.sent4: The pitchy aroma of the pine forest filled the air with nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The pitchy texture of the resin made it perfect for sealing cracks.
